name: DRING
description:
You found an empty bar full of booze, collect all the liquor bottles, while getting more and more drunk!

Also, watch out for randomly changing controls!


FEATURES:

COLLECT ALL 20 BOTTLES OF ALCOHOL TO FINISH THE GAME!

DESTROY YOUR SURROUNDINGS!

WATCH OUT FOR RANDOMLY CHANGING CONTROLS!

The more bottles you have collected the faster they change.

CONTROLS: 

W, S, A, D - Movement

MOUSE - Camera rotation

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Drink

INSTALATION:

Un-zip and run DRING.exe

CREDITS:

Created by Miroslav Prokop

In game music: Sloshed by Dee Yan-Key

Main menu music: Scheherazade by Dee Yan-Key

All other sounds  are from https://sonniss.com/ or  https://freesound.org/

This game has been made in less than 48 hour for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
